name: Bitsy Orpheus
description:
Your name is Orpheus... and your fiancee has died on your wedding day.  So what's a demi-god to do? Travel to the land of the dead and ask Hades to give her back of course!

Armed only with your wits and skill with a lyre, travel the underworld and bring Eurydice back.  If you can.

The idea for this game is based roughly on Ancient Greek mythology about Orpheus and is my first attempt at making a game with bitsy.  Hope you enjoy it as much as I had fun making it.

Note: Some characters have more than one thing to say. Try approaching them multiple times to get the information you need.
